A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: WTF! They turned Luke into a pansy and a shell of his former self. The Luke I know would never do the things he does in this movie. Leia can fly for no reason.  Rey is absurdly powerful with no training or experience. I had to Google what a \"Mary Sue\" is. The new characters are boring and flat! Why even bother with Snoke only for that to be his fate! Awful writing! Star Wars is dead.
